data.title: Romanian government changes environment law to allow Canadian mining company to start building the biggest cyanide gold mine in Europe wiping out from the face of the earth 4 mountains, ancient roman galleries and forcing people to move from their home. Protests start all over the country.
Sweden grants blanket asylum to Syrian refugees. “All Syrian asylum seekers who apply for asylum in Sweden will get it"
CIA files prove US helped Saddam Hussein as he gassed Iran
John McCain caught playing poker on his iPhone during hearing on Syria

Lenovo chief shares $3.25 million of bonus with staff -- "Most are hourly manufacturing workers. As you can imagine, an extra $300 in a manufacturing environment in China does make an impact, especially to employees supporting families"
Nobel Laureate Says Obama ‘Does Not Deserve’ Peace Prize
Russia’s early radars detect launch of two ballistic rockets in Mediterranean – Defense Ministry
In lieu of military intervention, Britain vows to 'lead the world' in providing humanitarian aid for Syrian refugees
More and More Journalists Are Being Kidnapped in Syria
Manchester: Rapist Richard Thomas Collapses after Discovering his Victim had HIV/Aids Virus
